div.p: RUDBECKIA in botany : a genus of the polygamia ſruſtanea order, belonging to the ſyngeneſia claſs of plants ; and in the natural method ranking under the 49th order, Compοβtιε. The receptacle is paleaceous and conical ; the pappus conſiſts of a quadridentatc margin ; the calyx of a double ſeries of ſcaly leaves.
